sen.j: 達如（たつにょ 1780年（安永9年）-1865年12月21日（慶応元年11月4日））は、浄土真宗の僧で、東本願寺第20代法主。
sen.e: Tatsunyo (1780 - December 21, 1865, which was November 4 according to the old calendar) was a Jodo Shinshu (True Pure Land Sect Buddhism) priest and the 20th Hoshu (high priest) of the Higashi Hongan-ji Temple.

sen.j: 数度の失火により消失した東本願寺本堂の再建を発願し、1835年（天保6年）に落成させるなどの功績を残し、1846年（弘化3年）、次男・厳如に法主を譲り隠居した。
sen.e: His achievements included the reconstruction of the main building of the Higashi Hongan-ji Temple in 1835, which was burned down by several fire accidents, and in 1846, he passed over his Hoshu post to his second son, Gonnyo, and retired.
